lead_paragraph: London 2012 single sculls champion Mahe Drysdale says the short commute for New Zealand's rowers to the Lagoa Stadium will give the country a welcome advantage over other teams at this month's Rio Olympics.

headline.print_headline: Lakeside Living a Bonus for NZ Rowers-Drysdale
headline.main: Lakeside Living a Bonus for NZ Rowers-Drysdale

snippet: London 2012 single sculls champion Mahe Drysdale says the short commute for New Zealand's rowers to the Lagoa Stadium will give the country a welcome advantage over other teams at this month's Rio Olympics....
